title: Is Capcom Installing Viruses On Your Computer...?
description:
Get a 14-day free trial with my sponsor Aura and see where your personal information is being sold online: https://aura.com/SOG

Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at what appears to be a situation where Capcom has updated a lot of their back catalog with a third party DRM solution called "Enigma Protector". Is this safe? Let's find out! Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
